name: ArchForm
headline: Replacing orthodontic braces with our clear aligner and software
description:
Archform is teeth aligner software startup that lets orthodontists create, design and 3D print aligners within their own offices.

The idea is to provide orthodontists with a way to better compete against some direct-to-consumer teeth aligner startups and cut down on the cost of Invisalign.
markdown:

[Log in](http://archform.com/<#>)[Log in](http://archform.com/<https:/dashboard2.archform.com/>)[Get Started](http://archform.com/</signup>)
## Easy-to-Use Orthodontic Treatment Planning Software for
## [In-Office Aligners](http://archform.com/</in-office>)## [Direct Print](http://archform.com/</direct-print>)
## [CNC Trimming](http://archform.com/</archmill>)## [Aligner Manufacturing](http://archform.com/</form-aligners>)
Transform your Practice with Same-Day Starts, Increased Profitability, and Better Clinical Control.
[Get started](http://archform.com/</signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/659b81310e31c608e6b47fad_Frame%203971.webp)
Benefits
## Transform Your Practice with ArchForm
Streamline your orthodontic workflow and improve patient outcomes with our advanced technology.
### Plan your Treatments in 10 Min.Without the Back-and-Forth.
Go from a scanned .stl file to a setup in minutes with automated trimming, segmentation, and automatic alignment.
### Same-Day Starts.
With in-office 3D printing, you can deliver an aligner or IDB tray in as little as 30 min,setting your practice apart and exceeding patient expectations.
### Start with braces.Finish with aligners.
Combine the traditional fixed appliance as a starting point, and finish with aligners for quicker finishes, and giving all your patients the option to debond sooner, while speeding up finishing.
### Increased Profitability
ArchForm can reduce your aligner bill by over 50%, while also increasing practice efficiency and reducing delays - all of which increase your bottom line.
### Grow your Practice
With reduced aligner cost, you can pass the savings on to your patients which can help you gain more patients and close more treatment opportunities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/659b81310e31c608e6b47fad_Frame%203971.webp)
3D Design Software
## Design Treatments Yourself for Better Control and Outcomes.
At ArchForm, we believe that orthodontists should have the ability to craft treatments according to their expertise. Our software lets you design treatments, ensuring greater control over the entire process. Take advantage of ArchForm's innovative solutions to enhance patient care and achieve outstanding results.
Automatic Alignment
Automatic Attachments
Advanced Staging, and many more features...
[Learn more about Design Software](http://archform.com/</software>)
Dashboard
## Manage your Patients and Orders
Effortlessly place orders for design services and aligners using our intuitive interface. Stay organized by tracking production, whether it's for your in-office lab or external manufacturing.
### Outsource Manufacturing and Setup Services
Whether you have a team of 2 or 200, our shared team inboxes keep everyone on the same page and in the loop.
### Keep Track of Your Patients
Sort your patients with advanced filtering, and keep track of everything that has been done for a specific patient. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/65a8e4e8c72a2bb75fcc61b4_Dashboard%20unbundled%20UI.webp)
Products
## Your Treatment Plan — Made your Way 
Discover unparalleled flexibility in how you implement your treatment planning, allowing you to treat your patient with the right product for them. Seamlessly switch between braces and aligners, or choose your preferred aligner production method: direct print, in-office, or ready-made. Enjoy flexibility like never before.
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/6425401c97e0b1bc54372995_2E0A3896%20v3%20copy%202.webp)
### Factory-Made Aligners
Aligners made and shipped to you from our robotic factory in California at a breakthrough price. Aligner packaging can also be custom branded to your office.
[Learn more](http://archform.com/</form-aligners>)
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/642537370aee52b5046bf469_1V7A68492.webp)
### In-Office Thermoforming
3D print models and make aligners in your office to get patients started right away, and for maximum cost savings.
[Learn more](http://archform.com/</in-office>)
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/65a8d3aabf251cf092c128f1_A001_06220425_S044%20corrected%20aspect%20ratio.webp)
### Direct Print Aligners
3D print aligners directly with MemoryForm™ shape memory material.
[Learn more](http://archform.com/</direct-print>)
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/65a8e9859a96b4844b231ebb_idb%20rendering%201%20\(2\)%20colored.webp)
### Indirect Bonding
Bond brackets with digital precision
[Coming soon](http://archform.com/<#>)
## Orthodontists Worldwide Love ArchForm
Hear how ArchForm has improved the practices of our users.
"For every person out there who wants to start in digital ortho, ArchForm is hands down the most user-friendly software out there, and I have tested all of them. Combining design, powerful tools, and a friendly interface is what makes ArchForm my #1 tool for my practice and for my students."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/6604c3fa3bcc0e3d40913169_WhatsApp%20Image%202024-03-27%20at%2017.27.21.webp)
Gabriel Baumeier
Orthodontist
“ArchForm is the most user-friendly 3D software available today. It has helped me over the years not only in doing my in-house aligners but also in conventional orthodontics as well. I use ArchForm to assist me in planning 100% of my cases today.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/65ad8f542a6410c16f907d18_Renato-Martins-14.webp)
Prof. Renato Martins
Orthodontist
"After testing almost every in-office aligner software, I found that Archform was the best. It’s changed the way I practice in every way. Finishing treatment after braces, hybrid treatment, and full treatment are all made easier. They are constantly improving and adding features that make treatment planning better."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/65ad8f0e65cbbfb9e39b7482_aaron%20swapp.webp)
Dr. Aaron Swap
Orthodontist
Usage
## ArchForm is a Global Leader in Digital Orthodontics
Join the community of doctors who trust ArchForm and discover for yourself why ArchForm is the preferred choice for innovation, usability, and savings.
$300M+
Saved for our Customers*
7M+
Aligners Made
*Average ArchForm price per case compared to a leading alternative aligner company. 
### Get started today with a $200 credit
Join thousands of doctors all over the globe that are transforming their practice with ArchForm
[Get started](http://archform.com/</signup>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/641e5a348be4f22f69167e71/642542a909463550b6cacc0e_ArchForm%20Wordmark%20-%20Colorful%2032.svg)](http://archform.com/</?r=0>)
We care about your data in our [privacy policy](http://archform.com/</privacy>).

generated_description:
**ArchForm: Revolutionizing Orthodontics**

ArchForm is a visionary startup that aims to replace traditional orthodontic braces with modern clear aligners and cutting-edge software. Founded in Sunnyvale, CA, and a part of Y Combinator’s W18 batch, ArchForm helps orthodontists design, create, and 3D print aligners on-site, making them competitive against direct-to-consumer alternatives like Invisalign.

### What They Do

ArchForm equips orthodontists with a software platform that streamlines the aligner creation process. They offer several key features that transform orthodontic practices:

- **Rapid Treatment Planning**: Orthodontists can set up treatments in just 10 minutes, automating tedious tasks like trimming and aligning designs.
- **Same-Day Starts**: With in-office 3D printing, patients can receive aligners or bonding trays in as little as half an hour—exceeding patient expectations.
- **Cost Reduction**: ArchForm claims to cut aligner costs by over 50%, allowing practices to enhance profitability and efficiency while passing savings to patients.

### Product Offerings

1. **3D Design Software**: Empower orthodontists to customize treatment plans, providing more control over patient care.
2. **Factory-Made and In-Office Aligners**: A flexible approach allows practices to choose between ready-made aligners or producing aligners in-house for immediate treatments.
3. **Direct Print Technology**: This feature utilizes shape-memory materials to create aligners directly in the office.

### The Team

With a team of 23 talented individuals, ArchForm is robustly positioned to lead the digital orthodontics space. Their goal isn’t just about technology; it’s about enhancing patient outcomes and practice efficiency.

### Impact

ArchForm has generated over $300 million in savings for its customers across 7 million aligners produced, underscoring the platform’s significant influence on the orthodontic field.

### Why It Matters

In a world where patient expectations are evolving, ArchForm is redefining what’s possible in orthodontics. Their innovative solutions not only streamline operations but also empower professionals to provide better care, improve patient satisfaction, and grow their practices.

For more information, visit [ArchForm](http://archform.com).

Buckle up, because with ArchForm, the future of orthodontics is here—and it’s clear.
